data.eml:eml: New species, new records and notes on Lamiinae from Neotropical Region (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wappes, James E., Galileo, Maria Helena M., Santos-Silva, Antonio (2017): New species, new records and notes on Lamiinae from Neotropical Region (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae). Zootaxa 4290 (1): 83-98, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4290.1.4
